fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Lie to a player at night, only showing them that they slept peacefully.
- Players you lie to are angered, counting votes towards you as two votes.
- At night, you may find out all players whose rolecards have contradictory or lying statements within them, determined by the host. You will always see "1 second role nc" as a role which has contradictory or lying statements within it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lie to a player who has read your rolecard. They must have typed your role into the bot or reacted to your rolecard in some way.
